verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> [was] eight שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> Josiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וְאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> and one שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's יְדִידָ֥ה <S%H3040><s%> [was] Jedidah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עֲדָ֖יָה <S%H5718><s%> of Adaiah מִבָּצְקַֽת׃ <S%H1218><s%> of Boscath

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and walked בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> in all the way דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> and turned not aside יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> or to the left פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become בִּשְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2977><s%> Josiah שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [that] the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁפָ֨ן <S%H8227><s%> Shaphan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲצַלְיָ֤הוּ <S%H683><s%> of Azaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֻׁלָּם֙ <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

עֲלֵ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִלְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2518><s%> to Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high וְיַתֵּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> that he may sum אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver הַמּוּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> which is brought בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָסְפ֛וּ <S%H622><s%> have gathered שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> which the keepers הַסַּ֖ף <S%H5592><s%> of the door מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

[וְיִתְּנֹה כ] (וְיִתְּנֻ֗הוּ <S%H5414><s%> deliver ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> it into the hand עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> of the doers הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> of the work הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> that have the oversight [בְּבֵית כ] (בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house ק) יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְיִתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> And let them deliver אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְעֹשֵׂ֤י <S%H6213><s%> it to the doers הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> of the work אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> to repair בֶּ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> which [is] in the house

לֶחָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2796><s%> Unto carpenters וְלַבֹּנִ֖ים <S%H1129><s%> and builders וְלַגֹּֽדְרִ֑ים <S%H1443><s%> and masons וְלִקְנ֤וֹת <S%H7069><s%> and to buy עֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> timber וְאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <S%H4274><s%> and hewn לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יֵחָשֵׁ֣ב <S%H2803><s%> Howbeit there was no reckoning made אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with them of the money הַנִּתָּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> that was delivered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into יָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> into their hand כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> faithfully הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> because they dealt

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חִלְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H2518><s%> And Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> the high עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto שָׁפָ֣ן <S%H8227><s%> unto Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe סֵ֧פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law מָצָ֖אתִי <S%H4672><s%> I have found בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave חִלְקִיָּ֧ה <S%H2518><s%> And Hilkiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֵּ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁפָ֖ן <S%H8227><s%> to Shaphan וַיִּקְרָאֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> and he read

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> came שָׁפָ֤ן <S%H8227><s%> And Shaphan הַסֹּפֵר֙ <S%H5608><s%> the scribe אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> word וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִתִּ֤יכוּ <S%H5413><s%> have gathered עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servants אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> the money הַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> that was found בַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֗הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and have delivered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> it into the hand עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> of them that do הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> the work הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> that have the oversight בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּגֵּ֞ד <S%H5046><s%> shewed שָׁפָ֤ן <S%H8227><s%> And Shaphan הַסֹּפֵר֙ <S%H5608><s%> the scribe לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying סֵ֚פֶר <S%H5612><s%> me a book נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered לִ֔י חִלְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַיִּקְרָאֵ֥הוּ <S%H7121><s%> read שָׁפָ֖ן <S%H8227><s%> And Shaphan לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> it before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> had heard הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> the words סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the book הַתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <S%H7167><s%> that he rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָֽיו׃ <S%H899><s%> his clothes

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חִלְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֡ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיקָ֣ם <S%H296><s%> and Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁ֠פָן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַכְבּ֨וֹר <S%H5907><s%> and Achbor בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִיכָיָ֜ה <S%H4320><s%> of Michaiah וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שָׁפָ֣ן <S%H8227><s%> and Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <S%H6222><s%> and Asahiah עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> a servant הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

לְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> Go דִרְשׁ֨וּ <S%H1875><s%> ye enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּעֲדִ֣י <S%H1157><s%> about וּבְעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> about הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> for me and for the people וּבְעַד֙ <S%H1157><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and for all Judah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> concerning the words הַסֵּ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of this book הַנִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> that is found הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> of this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גְדוֹלָ֞ה <S%H1419><s%> for great חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> [is] the wrath יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> that נִצְּתָ֣ה <S%H3341><s%> that is kindled בָ֔נוּ עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמְע֜וּ <S%H8085><s%> have not hearkened אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> against us because our fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> unto the words הַסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of this book הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַכָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> according unto all that which is written עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> concerning

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2518><s%> So Hilkiah הַ֠כֹּהֵן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַאֲחִיקָ֨ם <S%H296><s%> and Ahikam וְעַכְבּ֜וֹר <S%H5907><s%> and Achbor וְשָׁפָ֣ן <S%H8227><s%> and Shaphan וַעֲשָׂיָ֗ה <S%H6222><s%> and Asahiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חֻלְדָּ֨ה <S%H2468><s%> unto Huldah הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <S%H5031><s%> the prophetess אֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <S%H802><s%> the wife שַׁלֻּ֣ם <S%H7967><s%> of Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son תִּקְוָ֗ה <S%H8616><s%> of Tikvah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַרְחַס֙ <S%H2745><s%> of Harhas שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> keeper הַבְּגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> of the wardrobe וְהִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> she יֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> (now she dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem בַּמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <S%H4932><s%> the Second וַֽיְדַבְּר֖וּ <S%H1696><s%> spoke אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that sent אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> Behold I will bring רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> upon this place הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יֹֽשְׁבָ֑יו <S%H3427><s%> and upon the inhabitants אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> thereof [even] all the words הַסֵּ֔פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the book אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which קָרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> hath read מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which the king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah
